item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 3, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Elliott says Nvidia is in a ‘bubble’ and AI is ‘overhyped’
2. Global stock sell-off deepens after disappointing US jobs data
3. Fed under fire as slowing jobs market fans fears of recession
4. Rioting breaks out in Sunderland as UK police brace for weekend of unrest
5. Harris clinches Democratic nomination as campaign pulls in $310mn
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 3, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
